title: New free champion rotation: Blitzcrank, Gragas, Quinn and more!

replies.body:
could you put {{champion:103}} free next week?
'cause I really want to try her out!:)
PLEASE NEXT WEEK PUT FIORA ON SALE! I REALLY WANT TO PLAY HER!!!!!!!!!!!!!{{champion:114}}
{{champion:53}} {{item:3196}}__________{{summoner:6}}  Well looks like blitz support is gonna be in every game this week
I wonder how many Blitz noobs will actually hit a hook on a champ, or if they will just pull minions.
